dynapseNetGenerator¶

The module contains functions that permit to create networks of neurons and write connections on a .txt file. This last one can be used by cAER NETPARSER module to implement them in DYNAP-se

dynapseNetGenerator.write_connections(*connections_lists, fileName='network.txt')[source]¶

Write on a .txt file the network connections, ready to be uploaded to the final device.

Parameters:
  • *connection_lists (list of connections) – Contains the list of all the connections lists that must be written
  • the output file (in) –
  • fileName (string, optional) – Name of the output .txt file
